meanings.definition: To establish a connection or relationship between two or more things again.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the power lines were relinked to restore electricity to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I relinked with my childhood friend on social media after many years.
meanings.sent3: The detective relinked the evidence to solve the mysterious case.
meanings.sent4: Her smile relinked the broken pieces of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The old photos relinked me to cherished memories of the past.

meanings.definition: To restore a hyperlink or connection on a webpage.
meanings.sent1: The IT specialist relinked the broken webpage to make it functional again.
meanings.sent2: I had to relink the images on the website after they disappeared.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally relinked to a funny video while walking on the keyboard.
meanings.sent4: The missing link was finally relinked, completing the online chain.
meanings.sent5: She quickly relinked the webpage before the deadline.

meanings.definition: To reconnect or join together again.
meanings.sent1: The broken necklace was relinked by a skilled jeweler.
meanings.sent2: I relinked the train cars to continue the journey.
meanings.sent3: The siblings relinked after a silly argument.
meanings.sent4: The broken chain was relinked with a new, stronger link.
meanings.sent5: The old friends relinked their bond during the reunion.
